game_description: A true reincarnation of your favorite match-three puzzle, Zooma is a VR adventure challenging you to master the control and go through the chapters conquering them all. Check out what happens if you mix shooting, puzzles and classic match-three in virtual reality.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Japanese, Russian, Spanish (Spain), Ukrainian
review_1: Great game - it's fun and I keep jumping back in for 1-3 rounds. The only question that remains for me is: How can you reach 270 stars per chapter? I count 30 levels per chapter, which would be 90 stars per chapter.
review_2: Love this game. Very similar to zuma and zuma’s revenge which I loved playing on pc so if like me you loved these games you’ll love this
review_3: I really like the game, I do. But every time I Exit the game my headset glitches and my Menu will not pop up. Actually, nothing will pop up regardless of what I click. I have to restart my headset every time. This is the only app that causes this issue.
review_4: Great game. I play this at night when I want to wind down. I’ve always loved playing zuma and this is it in VR.
review_5: How this is game not on the main Oculus Store is beyond me. This is already a AAA puzzle game that is addictive as they come.
